name: bright inventions
description:
Bright Inventions is a software consulting studio based in Gdansk, Poland operating since 2012. Our expertise in mobile, web, blockchain and IOT systems has been highly appreciated by our clients from UK, Germany, Netherlands, Norway, Israel and more.
We enjoy helping our customers throughout all of the software delivery phases: from the ideation, through requirements elicitation, graphic design, project management, software development, quality assurance and maintenance.
Many times projects that we work on grow eventually into big, highly successful ventures on both technical and business side.
We lead our work with close engagement of our customers and full transparency. Taking advantage of close distance to our partners we mix remote work with as much on site collaboration as possible. When the right time comes it’s natural for us to help our customers grow their own development team who will take over the further evolution of the product.
Our usual clients are consultancy agencies, startups and mid-size organisations on their way to digital transformation.
